item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "Of course motivation is not permanent. But then, neither is bathing; but it is something you should do on a regular basis." -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "Lack of direction, not lack of time, is the problem. We all have twenty-four hour days." -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "When obstacles arise, you change your direction to reach your goal; you do not change your decision to get there." -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "Among the things you can give and still keep are your word, a smile, and a grateful heart." -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great" -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "The chief cause of failure and unhappiness is trading what you want most for what you want right now" -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "You can have everything in life that you want if you just give enough other people what they want." -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "If you go out looking for friends, you're going to find they are very scarce. If you go out to be a friend, you'll find them everywhere." -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "Make today worth remembering." -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "There are no traffic jams on the extra mile." -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "You never know when a moment and a few sincere words can have an impact on a life." -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "If you aim at nothing, you will hit it every time." -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "Some people find fault like there is a reward for it" -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "Outstanding people have one thing in common: an absolute sense of mission" -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "The more you are grateful for what you have the more you will have to be grateful for" -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "Attitude, not Aptitude, determines Altitude." -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "The greatest of all mistakes is to do nothing because you think you can only do a little." -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "Success is the doing, not the getting; in the trying, not the triumph. Success is a personal standard, reaching for the highest that is in us, becoming all that we can be. If we do our best, we are a success." -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "Duty makes us do things well, but love makes us do them beautifully." -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "You cannot consistently perform in a manner which is inconsistent with the way you see yourself." -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "It was character that got us out of bed, commitment that moved us into action and discipline that enabled us to follow through." -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "Optimists are those who go after Moby dick in a row boat with a bucket of tarter sauce." -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "Make failure your teacher, not your undertaker." -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "The most important persuasion tool you have in your entire arsenal is integrity." -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals." -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "Ability can take you to the top, but it takes character to keep you there" -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "Failing is an event, not a person. Yesterday ended last night." -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "When you put faith, hope and love together, you can raise positive kids in a negative world." -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "Motivation is the fuel, necessary to keep the human engine running." -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Russ add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "Motivation gets you going and habit gets you there." -- Zig Ziglar
